ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $User.Bypass_User_Validations__c = False, TEXT( RT__c ) <> "Portfolio", RecordType.Name = "Private Equity - Industrials" , TEXT ( CS__c ) = "Include", TEXT ( Sector_Industrials__c ) = "" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Sector to be shown for JYB/SCN Reporting.
